display_long_description:
Mystic Tag is a virtual reality multiplayer experience that blends intense movement with magical landscapes. In this fast-paced game of tag, you don’t need joysticks or buttons — just your hands and momentum. Climb ancient ruins, leap between enchanted trees, and dash through glowing caverns as you chase or flee other players in a world shaped by mysticism and motion.

Whether you're a casual explorer or a skilled runner, Mystic Tag offers endless fun through fluid parkour mechanics, community-driven content, and ever-expanding maps. From eerie forests to floating islands, every corner holds a new challenge. Customize your character with mystical cosmetics and make your mark as one of the fastest beings in the realm.

Welcome to Mystic Tag — where movement is magic.
